Pithanelogia, or, A perswasive to conformity by way of a letter to the dissenting brethren / by a country minister. Hinckley, John, 1617?-1695.
[4], 184 p.
Printed for Thomas Basset, London : 1670.
1st word of title in Greek characters. Errata following p. 184. Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to John Hinckley. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
